string.value: I hear that Kyrin is looking for me, now that I've become a Buccaneer. She apparently wants to teach me some new skills...
I must show Kyrin my skills to prove what I'm capable of. I'd better make sure I'm ready to show her everything I've got and stand up to her for at least 2 minutes.
I've finally gained Kyrin's confidence. And she has taught me the super transformation skill in return.

It's been a while. You've changed quite a bit since the last time I saw you. I still remember when you first came here wanting to become a Pirate, and now you're a Buccaneer. How does it feel to become one?

Don't you feel like you are lacking that something? If you feel that you are already plenty strong, then you are deathly wrong. The path to greatness is filled with treacherous obstacles, one that you'll have to continuously walk on. Hmmm... from looking at you, I can sense that you need that extra something.

That's the attitude I've been looking for. I'll teach you a new skill that'll blow you away. Under one condition, that is... You may be a Buccaneer, but you may not have reached the level that I want you to be in. If you pass the test I give you, then and only then will I give you the new skill.

My test basically involves... withstanding me. You'll be dueling me in a battle, and I'll be using the new skill that I'll teach you. If you can withstand the attack, then you'll be good. I won't go easy on you, so you may want to really prepare yourself for this test. Now, let me know when you're ready to take on the challenge.
Are you afraid to take the test? And you're telling me you're a Buccaneer? How disappointing...
Congratulations. You have managed to pass my test. I'll teach you a new skill called 'Super Transformation'.
It is similar to that of 'Transformation', but it's much more powerful than that. Keep training, and hope to see you around.
